name: Pot-Shot
description:
Pot-Shot

Originally submitted to the Unexpected Game Jam 2020 on September 13th, 2020.

A top-down wave bullet hell shooter where the rules of the game change every 30 seconds. You must adapt to survive.

This is the first game released by Doc, Talamander, and Somebean.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

LeftClick - Shoot

Spacebar - Dash

Lower end hardware will need to disable 2D lighting in the Options Menu

View the Help Menu for controls and more

Made with the Godot Engine
